description:
Both private and institutional investors have poured billions into Eni's "green-labelled" bonds, under terms and conditions that enable the company to continue to fund carbon-emitting activities.

The post How Italy’s largest fossil fuel company uses ‘green’ bonds as a loophole to keep financing hydrocarbons appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How Italy’s largest fossil fuel company uses ‘green’ bonds as a loophole to keep financing hydrocarbons
